Required input
Hardware serial number (aeHwSerialNumber): %(aeHwSerialNumber)s

Status (aeStatus): %(aeStatus)s
Expiry Status (aeExpiryStatus): %(aeExpiryStatus)s
Optional input
Intended purpose (description): %(description)s

Validity period (aeNotBefore..aeNotAfter):
from
%(aeNotBefore)s
until
%(aeNotAfter)s
